ProductInfo.Features:
4CH 1080P NVR connectable to network cameras with up to 5 Megapixels resolution. Support live view, storage and playback of video at 5 Megapixels resolution. 4 independent PoE network interfaces are provided
Adverse playback for multi-channel. Digital zoom in live view and playback mode. 4CH simultaneous playback at D1 resolution
Redundant recording, 2 SATA interfaces available. Dual system design ensures high reliability and stability. Third-party network cameras supported. HDMI and VGA output at up to 1920×1080P resolution
IP camera with 1.3 megapixel high resolution, HD video output, low illumination, weather-proof, 30 infrared LEDs good for night view, infrared distance up to 90ft, super low-light
Camera dimensions: 2.4" x 3.0" x 5.4", 0.6 lbs. NVR dimensions: 17.5" x 11.4" x 1.8", 4 lbs. Package includes 4 IP Cameras, 1 NVR (1 TB hard drive pre-installed), 1 mouse, 1 user manual, 1 remote control
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Surveillance System with 4 Channel 1080p Network Video Recorder NVR including 4 Built-In PoE Ports, 1TB Hard Drive and 4 1.3 Megapixel Night/Day Outdoor IP Bullet Security Cameras
